Package it.brujo.json

Class JSonValue

java.lang.Object
it.brujo.json.JSonElem
it.brujo.json.JSonValue
Direct Known Subclasses:
JSonConst, JSonNumber, JSonString
public abstract class JSonValue extends JSonElem
Base class for a basic values (Number,String,true,false or null)

  • Constructor Details

    • JSonValue

      public JSonValue()

  • Method Details

    • stringValue

      public abstract String stringValue()
      This method is intended to be as lenient as possibile and return a string also if the underlying class is a Number o a Constant
      Returns:
      a String representation of the value

    • intValue

      public abstract Integer intValue()
      This method is intended to be as lenient as possible and return the most suitable integer value. If the underlying class is a Number the result is obtained from Number.intValue()
      Returns:
      a integer representation of the value. Can be null

    • longValue

      public abstract Long longValue()
      This method is intended to be as lenient as possible.
      Returns:
      a Long representation of the value. Can be null
      See Also:
      intValue()

    • doubleValue

      public abstract Double doubleValue()
      This method is intended to be as lenient as possible.
      Returns:
      a Double representation of the value. Can be null
      See Also:
      intValue()

    • booleanValue

      public abstract boolean booleanValue()
      This method is intended to be as lenient as possible.
      Returns:
      a boolean representation of the value. Can be null
      See Also:
      intValue()
